objectives.notes: Thorlabs TL4X-SAP with LifeCanvas dipping cap and correction optics

processing.notes: This processing was generated by compiling independent processing jsons for every step

data_processes.name: Image destriping
data_processes.notes: Destriping for channel Ex_488_Em_525 in zarr format

data_processes.name: Image flat-field correction
data_processes.notes: The flats were computed from the data             with basicpy, these were applied with the destriping algorithm             and with the current dark from the microscope.

data_processes.name: Image atlas alignment
data_processes.notes: Template based registration: LS -> template -> Allen CCFv3 Atlas
